eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Brown, TX; AT 12:15 PM ON NOV 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:15 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: There is a grass fire on cr 456. there had been a request for evacuation however at this time that has been removed.  Fire advises that they believe they have it under control. Due to high winds in the are we ask If you are in this area please keep a watch and evacuate if you feel the need. Please refrain from driving to the area of the fire so the fire departments can handle this matter.
